results.title: Free school meals | Oldham Council
results.snippet: Eligibility. You can get free school meals if your child attends a local authority maintained school (not private) and you receive one of the following:.

results.title: Help for families | Help for families | Oldham Council
results.snippet: Food vouchers are available for families of children eligible for means-tested Free School Meals, for school holiday periods in Spring, summer and Christmas ...

results.title: School meals | Life at school | Oldham Council
results.snippet: Free school meals are available to children whose families are eligible. Schools also provide facilities for pupils who bring packed lunches.

context.search_topic: How to get free school meals
context.need: I'm recently been made unemployed and I do not have an income, I'd like to apply for free school meals. I'm keen to know what is the criteria and how quickly I will find out if I'm eligible

search_parameters.query: How to get free school meals

recommendation.reason: Link appears suitable for user needs
next_steps: Follow the link to access the content

Reason.need: I'm recently been made unemployed and I'd like to apply for free school meals. I'm keen to know what is the criteria
Reason.reasoning: The provided content makes no mention of unemployment or income as a criterion for eligibility in its current form. It only discusses universal free school meals for children in reception, year 1 and year 2 in state-funded schools in England.
Reason.next_actions: Inquire with the Council's customer service about the specific criteria based on unemployment or income to be eligible for means-tested free school meals.

Reason.need: I'd like to understand how quickly I will find out if I'm eligible
Reason.reasoning: The provided content does not specify the time it takes for an application process or notification of eligibility. However, the general timeline might be more quickly than other benefits as it involves school administrators and not a Central Government agency.
Reason.next_actions: Contact the Council's customer service to get more clarification on the estimated approval timeline.

analysis.overall_assessment: The content provides minimal information relevant to a Council Resident who is interested in applying for free school meals due to unemployment. Key information like criteria, time, and assistance during the process are missing or unclear. This lack of accessibility to necessary details results in an overall satisfaction level of 30%.
